description:
Enjoy FreeCell, Klondike, Tri-Peaks and many other types of Solitaire!

This full featured game will provide endless entertainment. You can control the look and feel with custom backgrounds, and many other options. The game play is effortless with cards that are easy to drag, smart auto play and unlimited undo.

Also look for Solitaire Collection for phones running webOS 2.x, from the same developer!
versionNote:
- Canfield now allows infinite redeal (as it should). The variants of canfield still limit the redeal count correctly.

- Tapping on a face down card in tri-peaks will no longer play that card.

- The "You won" dialog will now be displayed properly in gaps and golf (and variants) in all cases.

- Improved options in the help menu
